channel.title: 508 Server Manager - Easy Compiling (No Need To Use cmd Folder) New Version!
channel.description:
[LEFT][SIZE=5][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]o.O 508 Server Manager V1.1! O.o[/FONT] [/SIZE][/LEFT] [FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]By Luke Rogers![/FONT] [FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]A "Perfect Compiler" For 508![/FONT]
[URL=http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/316/29277871mx1.jpg][IMG]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/316/29277871mx1.th.jpg[/img][/URL]
[FONT=Fixedsys]Features:[/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=3]New Release! Now Has Updated Menus And Runescape Version Grabber! [/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif][URL=http://"http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/7591/77348560hs7.jpg"]Easy, Unique Compiler System (For 508, It Is Unique)[/URL] Can Tell You What The Current Rs Version Is <New!> Runs In An Easy And Lightweight .Bat Or .Cmd File Has Partally Done "Fuzzy" Commands Eg. You can use "iopackets" or "packets" or "ccom" or "comm" or "COM" Run Command Opens Separate .Bat/.Cmd Window Miniguides Included In File (Finished Base But None Yet, I Will Add In V2.0 Or Earlier) Has Settings Command To Change Colours Submit A Feature, I Will Try To Make![/FONT]
[FONT=Fixedsys]How To Add It:[/FONT] [FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif]Just Download These Files, Add Them Into Your Cmd Folder, And Run The .cmd File! To Use, Simply Type The Command You Want! [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zgymunyboj5]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zgymunyboj5[/URL]
[/FONT][FONT=Fixedsys] Faq:[/FONT] [FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif] Q: How Do I Change The Jdk Path, Without Editing All Of The Code? A: Simple! Right Click Edit ( Or Open In Notepad) The Main .cmd File, Scroll Down To The "REM Put Your Jdk Version Here!"'s And Edit The Jdk Below! [/FONT][code]set jdkver=jdk1.6.0_06 [/code][FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif]Q: I Cant Right Click Edit? Just Rename The .cmd To A .txt, Then Open And Edit! After That, Rename It Back To A .cmd File
Q: Can I Rename It To A .Cmd File? A: Of Course! N.a. Now Comes In A .Cmd, Which Just Looks Better Than A .bat File!
Post All Of your Questions Here! Remember to Rep! ;)[/FONT]

item.title: 508 Server Manager - Easy Compiling (No Need To Use cmd Folder) New Version!
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

does this run ur server 24/7 even if i shut computer off?

[/quo[quote=“CAPT_AMERIKA, post:9, topic:234450”][quote author=kendrick123456 link=topic=309115.msg2751170#msg2751170 date=1239919964]
does this run ur server 24/7 even if i shut computer off?

lmao no… in order for server to run,… you need to have the server running… which is the black window.

Computer off == server off[/quote]te]
you and you o.o! look at date! this is sooo out-of-date/grave digging bye the first person! please don’t post on old topics like this!

Read full topic

item.title: 508 Server Manager - Easy Compiling (No Need To Use cmd Folder) New Version!
item.dc:creator: @Rs2-Devolution Rs2-Devolution
item.description:
@Rs2-Devolution wrote:

[LEFT][SIZE=5][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]o.O 508 Server Manager V1.1! O.o[/FONT]
[/SIZE][/LEFT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]By Luke Rogers![/FONT]
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]A “Perfect Compiler” For 508![/FONT]

[FONT=Fixedsys]Features:[/FONT]

[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium][SIZE=3]New Release! Now Has Updated Menus And Runescape Version Grabber! [/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif]Easy, Unique Compiler System (For 508, It Is Unique)
Can Tell You What The Current Rs Version Is <New!>
Runs In An Easy And Lightweight .Bat Or .Cmd File
Has Partally Done “Fuzzy” Commands
Eg. You can use “iopackets” or “packets” or “ccom” or “comm” or “COM”
Run Command Opens Separate .Bat/.Cmd Window
Miniguides Included In File (Finished Base But None Yet, I Will Add In V2.0 Or Earlier)
Has Settings Command To Change Colours
Submit A Feature, I Will Try To Make![/FONT]

[FONT=Fixedsys]How To Add It:[/FONT]
[FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif]Just Download These Files, Add Them Into Your Cmd Folder, And Run The .cmd File!
To Use, Simply Type The Command You Want!
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zgymunyboj5

[/FONT][FONT=Fixedsys]
Faq:[/FONT]
[FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif]
Q: How Do I Change The Jdk Path, Without Editing All Of The Code?
A: Simple! Right Click Edit ( Or Open In Notepad) The Main .cmd File, Scroll Down To The
“REM Put Your Jdk Version Here!”'s And Edit The Jdk Below!
[/FONT]set jdkver=jdk1.6.0_06 [FONT=Microsoft Sans Serif]Q: I Cant Right Click Edit?
Just Rename The .cmd To A .txt, Then Open And Edit! After That, Rename It Back To A .cmd File

Q: Can I Rename It To A .Cmd File?
A: Of Course!
N.a. Now Comes In A .Cmd, Which Just Looks Better Than A .bat File!

Post All Of your Questions Here!
Remember to Rep! ;)[/FONT]

Read full topic
item.source: 508 Server Manager - Easy Compiling (No Need To Use cmd Folder) New Version!
